435820.name: Soul Axiom - Art Book
435820.description:
Experience this special edition art book from Wales Interactive's adventure cyber-thriller Soul Axiom. Featuring 170 pages (85 double pages) of behind the scenes concept art and artwork used in the creation of the game. A real insight into Soul Axiom's development, the game creators’ minds and the beautiful digital world of Elysia.

The Soul Axiom art book will be downloaded to your computer as an eBook (PDF). You must have Soul Axiom installed on your computer to receive the DLC content.
435820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
